ehidi adahas dak wu amathya disanayaka mahatha “ samaharunta me jathika aanduwa tikak alajikne, ape ayatath podi prashnayak thiyenawa, ee kale e.ja.paya thaniyama aandu karaddi awurudu 17k parana shri lanka nidahas pakshikayo guti kawa, ape ayage athapaya kaduwa, gewal gini thibba.api aandu gaththata passe apith aduwadi washayen eewa karala thiyenawa awurudu 20 k, ee palahilawwa thamayi me thiyenne.eda guti kawa nisa api aandu aran munta gahanna oona, api hondata thalala, ee aya eelangata aandu gaththama aaye apita thalanawa.mekada api wadihitiyo widihata ape eelanga paramparawata dayada karanna oona.mage thaththa masa 03 k hire hitiya mamath hire inna oonada, mage daruwath hire inna oonada.eksath jathika paksha aandu kale ape aya awurudu 17k, ape ayata rassawa ganna bariwa hitiya nam, api awurudu 20 k aandu karaddi e.ja.pa pakshikayata rassawak ganna bariwa hitiya nam ape daruwatath ee anagathayamada bhara karanna oona.api prathipaththimaya deshapalanayak karanna oona.eksath jathika pakshayata prathipaththiyak thiyenna oona, shri lanka nidahas pakshayata prathipaththiyak thiyenna oona, janathawa me prathipaththi walin wada honda mokakda kiyala thindu karanna oona, ee anuwa jandaya denna oona.habayi api me paksha deshapalanayath ekka apekama, game kama, hithawathkama, manussakama nathi kara gena innawa.me monawa wenuwenda, monawada labenne.habayi lokko tika ekata innawa.mahinda mahaththayayi -ranil mahaththayayi ekata kopi bila horen, apita eeka ahuwuna.ranil mahaththayata prashnayak wena kota sirikotha issaraha para kapat karanna para wahuwa.ehemayi udaw kale, rata rata horen gihin kopi biwwa.dan pradhana paksha deke nayakayo wana maithri mahaththayayi ranil mahaththayayi gaththama ekkenek janadhipathi, anek kena agamathi ekama aanduwe aandu karanawa.ayi me gama gahaganne.eelanga mathiwaranayedi shri lanka nidahas pakshaya -eksath jathika pakshaya wena wenama mathawada ekka wenama mathiwarana walata tharanga karanawa.api me jathika aanduwa haduwe maraganna me wairi deshapalanaya nawaththala, ratak widihata issarahata yanna, me rate nathi wuna boho dewal sthapitha karamin , rata sanwardhanaya karannayi.ee wagema me jathika aanduwe pradhana paksha deka katayuthu karaddi ee labena gaurawayath degollantama himiyi, banumath degollantama himiyi.ehema nathiwa gaurawaya api aragena banuma anek paththata denna ba yayida pawasiya.
